completion.title: Congratulations!
completion.autoNotesNote: Since auto notes were used, this game will not count towards your statistics.

gameOver.title: Game Over!
gameOver.message: You made too many mistakes. Try again!
gameOver.autoNotesNote: Since auto notes were used, this game will not count towards your statistics.

cellSelected.title: Hint
cellSelected.message: You should fill this cell next. Press the hint button again to see the correct number.

initialCell.title: Hint
initialCell.message: This cell is already correctly filled.

noErrors.title: Well done!
noErrors.message: Your Sudoku looks good! Keep going.

autoNotes.title: Auto Notes
autoNotes.message:
All possible notes have been filled in the empty cells.
This game will not count towards your statistics.

quit.title: Return to Main Menu?
quit.message: Your current game progress will be lost.
